name: Eco-Adventure Experiences
description: A platform offering eco-friendly travel adventures with detailed information on various experiences.

name: Gadget Heaven E-commerce
description: An e-commerce platform where users can adopt or buy pets and view detailed pet information.

name: Movie Portal
description: A full-stack single-page car repair web app where people can take and book services. Login system with Firebase and private routes. Dashboard for users and admins where admins can do CRUD operations and users can give reviews and monitor their booking list.
